job_title: Junior Project Developer in Islamabad, Islamabad

pros:
Gives young people an opportunity to hold management positions and have job responsibilities that probably would be unlikely in any other organization
Good perks, housing has been nice
Some projects have been helpful to the community
cons:
HR department barely exists in HQ - basically a recruiting machine. No attention given to real HR issues such as performance management, capacity building, work/life balance.
High turnover makes it difficult to be productive and efficient. 
Management in HQ make snap judgements on employees. If the judgment is negative, often times the person is pushed out in a very unprofessional manner. Management comes off as being heartless.
Too much focus on what donors want and not what beneficiaries want. 
Work/life balance is non-existent. Extremely late work hours, high stress environment when it is unnecessary.
